headline: CSX Corporation Announces Increase to Quarterly Dividend
summary: JACKSONVILLE, Fla., Feb. 26, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- CSX Corp. (NASDAQ: CSX) announced today that the Company’s Board of Directors approved a $0.14 per share quarterly dividend on the Company’s common stock, payable on March 13, 2026, to shareholders of record at the close of business on February 27, 2026. This reflects an eight percent increase over the previous dividend payment of $0.13 per share. About CSX and its Disclosures CSX, based in Jacksonville, Florida, is a premier transportation c
